title.rendered: Professional Website Design and S.E.O Agency In Benin City Nigeria

[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#0D1267″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”40px” custom_margin=”46px||35px|||”]

About Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”Actor||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px”]

WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES is a Website Design and Digital Marketing Agency in Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria. We are one of the biggest and fastest-growing Digital Marketing and Website Design Agency in Benin City. With over 7 years of working experience we pride our self’s as a great company that focuses on customer satisfaction and retention

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET STARTED NOW” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_width=”5px” button_border_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_radius=”5px” button_font=”Alata|700|||||||”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/info-5.jpg” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ width=”75%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|50px|50px|50px|50px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.2.1″ type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

Our Vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″]

Our vision is to use innovative technologies to inform, inspire, tell brand stories, and create solutions for small and large business owners within Nigeria and Africa.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.2.1″ type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

Our Mission

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″]

To Empower people together with business in order to succeed.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.2.1″ type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#00208a” hover_enabled=”0″]

Our Business Solutions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” hover_enabled=”0″]

We offer Digital Marketing Solutions, IT Training, Web Development, Software Development, and Solutions to Individuals, Small and Large Business Owners, Entrepreneurs, and Institutions.

Our Digital Marketing Team At WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES work with you till you get results and sales..

Webbiit Technologies Helps Tell Your Business Story Using The Power Of Creative Brand Identities And Responsive Websites.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”10px|0px|20px|0px||” saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Title Row” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Ubuntu||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#00208a” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”601px” module_alignment=”center”]

WHAT WE DO

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Website Development” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%202%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

We are one of the Best Web Design Digital Marketing Company Benin City. We help tell your business story.

 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Content Marketing” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%134%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

Content is the king of the internet, more quality content more traffic, more traffic more visitors, more visitors more sales, more sales, more money.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Search Engine Optimization” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%164%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

We have a team of trained S.E.O experts, who can help your website rank on Google’s first page.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Trainings” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%157%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

We train, we equip with the desired Digital Marketing skill that will give you edge in the job market and help you make more money online even as a Freelancer.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ hover_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”App Development” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%149%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

Whatever your mobile app requirement may be, we are capable of developing a custom mobile app for clients around the world

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Email Marketing” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%238%%” icon_color=”#FFFFFF” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#00208a” use_circle_border=”on” circle_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_font_size=”28px” body_font=”Actor||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_bottom=”3px” border_color_bottom=”#00208a” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”80%|80%” circle_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” circle_color__hover=”#c55f0d”]

We help create a strong email marketing strategy that helps you connect with your customers and target audience in a personalized way. This will increase sales and get you more leads

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#0D1267″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”28px” hover_enabled=”0″]

WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES has three main lines of business in Nigeria and hoping to span through Africa –Web and Software Development, IT Trainings, Media Productions in Photo, Video, and Film Making.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ hover_enabled=”0″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF”]

Over the past 7 years we have been and we are still in the business of growing and expanding both small and large scale businesses both online and offline. We always ensure to keep our work process easy, transparent and understandable to our esteemed clients in order to achieve good and successful results. All development problems always starts with not been able to understand the customers goal. At WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES We learn and understands our Clients Goals, Articulate this goals and use our expertise to provide the best solution in achieving success in your business.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.2.1″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#c55f0d” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_font=”Alata|700|||||||”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][wdcl_logo_carousel animation_speed=”1800ms” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][wdcl_logo_carousel_child logo=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/logo-1.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][/wdcl_logo_carousel_child][wdcl_logo_carousel_child logo=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/bidvertiser1.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][/wdcl_logo_carousel_child][wdcl_logo_carousel_child logo=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/fashionafria.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][/wdcl_logo_carousel_child][wdcl_logo_carousel_child logo=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/oshe.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][/wdcl_logo_carousel_child][wdcl_logo_carousel_child logo=”https://webbiit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/oshonism.png” _builder_version=”4.2.1″][/wdcl_logo_carousel_child][/wdcl_logo_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″ background_color=”#0D1267″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”99%” module_alignment=”center”]

About Us

We are Expert Website Designers and Developers, Web Hosting, S.E.O And Professional Digital Marketing Experts In Benin City, Nigeria. Webbiit Technologies specializes In Developing world class Online E-presence, corporate Identity management software development services.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.2.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.2.1″ text_font=”Actor||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font=”Alata|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF”]

Our Services

At WEBBIIT TECHNOLOGIES we offer services Such as Website Development, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Training and Certification, App development, Cyber Security, Social Media Optimization e.t.c. Our Services Are aimed at Making Business Grow and Succeed Online.
